ctx: intros f g n x H.
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R x : R H : forall t : R, f t = g t Unable to unify "Derive_n g 0 x" with "Derive_n f 0 x".

ctx: intros f g n x H.
exceptions.exn: The LHS of IHn (Derive_n _ n _) does not match any subterm of the goal

ctx: intros f g n x H.
exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat IHn : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : R), (forall t : R, f t = g t) -> Derive_n f n x = Derive_n g n x f, g : R -> R x : R H : forall t : R, f t = g t Unable to unify "f ?M2373 = g ?M2373" with "Derive (Derive_n f n) x = Derive (Derive_n g n) x".

original: intros f g n x H. revert f g x H. induction n. - intros. reflexivity. - intros. simpl. rewrite IHn. apply H.
